posts.post_content:
A few weeks ago someone on the main forum pointed out that some Miller's have a period (or cut off comma, who knows) instead of a comma, so I started buying up the ones with the period, only to find that at least 10% of examples reviewed had the period... so it's nothing special as I had hoped.

I'm selling off the hoard. :)

Looking for reasonable offers on any of the cards below.
PayPal gift or payment owed preferred.

$125 takes the whole group.

[url]trae@t206.org[/url]

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/miller_psa5.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/miller_raw.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/miller_sgc30.jpg[/IMG]
PM me what you'd want for the non-graded Miller. Thanks!
